experimental_methods: cell line induced to form beating cardiomyocytes by the addition of DMSO
direct phosphorylation of GATA-4 and export via Crm1
mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase kinase TAK1
directly interacts with Nkx2-5, GATA4, and GATA5 in regulation of gene expression
model_organisms: mouse cell line derived from cardiac mesoderm
